baseRule.text: 若比丘。僧不差而教誡比丘尼。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer die Nonnen belehrt, ohne dazu befugt zu sein, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk who has not been appointed instructs the nuns, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, sin haber sido autorizado, instruye a las bhikkhunis: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。僧不差教誡比丘尼。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 若比丘僧不差教比丘尼。教者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻眾不差遣。自往教誡苾芻尼者。除獲勝法。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。僧不差教誡比丘尼。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！僧不差，教誡比丘尼者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

translations.text: If a monk, with no commission from the monks, shall impart instruction to the bhikṣuṇīs, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu mengajar para bhikṣuṇī tanpa ditugaskan oleh Saṅgha, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘僧不差。教授比丘尼者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 若比丘僧不差教授比丘尼。波逸提。
